Title: England midfielder Henderson joins Brentford
Summary: England midfielder Jordan Henderson joined Brentford on a free transfer on Tuesday . Henderson agreed a two-year contract with the Bees as he returned to the Premier League after leaving Liverpool in 2023 .

Title: Barca star Yamal faces probe into dwarf entertainers at 18th birthday
Summary: Barcelona star Lamine Yamal is facing an investigation regarding the presence of a group of people with dwarfism as entertainers at his 18th birthday party last weekend . Spain’s Ministry of Social Rights said Tuesday . The winger celebrated with a band of people who have dwarfism at his party .

Title: Buhari to be buried in his compound – Spokesman
Summary: Buhari will be buried in courtyard of his private residence in Daura, Katsina State . Islamic rites scheduled to take place on Tuesday . According to Garba Shehu, the former president's spokesperson, preparations are underway for a low-key burial .

Title: Buhari would have died earlier if treated by Nigerian hospitals – Adesina
Summary: Femi Adesina has defended the late President Muhammadu Buhari’s consistent medical trips to London . The former presidential spokesperson said survival and access to expertise mattered more than public perception . He dismissed long-standing criticisms over the President's reliance on London trips .

Title: In tears, Buhari’s daughter, others arrive place of burial
Summary: Fatima Buhari arrived at her father’s home in Daura on Tuesday in tears . Fatima looked very sad and heartbroken and was seen crying quietly .

Title: Lamine Yamal faces probe into dwarf entertainers at 18th birthday
Summary: Yamal turned 18 on July 13, the day after his party on Saturday night, which many of his team-mates attended . Yamal faces probe into dwarf entertainers at 18th birthday .

Title: I lived with Buhari for 25 years – Pantami
Summary: Pantami said Buhari’s name has been synonymous with integrity . He said he never doubted it following his interactions with him . Pantami lived with the president for 25 years .

Title: Buhari: Moroccan King commiserates with Tinubu
Summary: King Mohammed VI of Morocco has extended condolences to President Bola Tinubu over death of Muhammadu Buhari . His Majesty Mohammed VI extended his condolences to the former Nigerian president .

Title: England midfielder Henderson joins Brentford
Summary: England midfielder Jordan Henderson joined Brentford on a free transfer on Tuesday . Henderson left Dutch side Ajax to join Brentford in a deal worth £16million . England midfielder joins Brentford from Holland's Ajax .

Title: No written pact for Buhari to hand over power to me, Bakare clarifies
Summary: Pastor Tunde Bakare has revealed that there was no formal written agreement for the late former President Muhammadu Buhari to hand over power to him . Bakare had a history with the former President, serving as his running mate in the 2011 presidential election under the Congress for Progressive Change, an election they lost .

Title: Enugu adopts new strategy to streamline health sector budgeting
Summary: Enugu State Government has embarked on developing Annual Operational Plans that would be integrated into the state’s 2026 health sector budget . This initiative is part of the Nigeria Health Sector Renewal Investment Initiative . The NHSRII is a sector-wide programme that seeks to bring together every single player in the health sector under one coordinating

Title: Late Awujale was an exemplary monarch - Afenifere
Summary: The Leader of the pan-Yoruba socio-political organisation, Chief Reuben Fasoranti, described the late Awujale of Ijebuland, Oba Sikiru Adetona, as an exemplary monarch who made a significant positive impact during his 62-year reign .

Title: Buhari could have long died if he had used Nigerian hospitals — Ex-spokesman Adesina
Summary: Former Special Adviser on Media and Publicity to ex-President Muhammadu Buhari, Femi Adesina, has said the former Nigerian leader may have not survived his health challenges if he had relied solely on Nigerian hospitals for treatment .
